Definitions: You will be given some input text and you need to classify the intent of the text.
Given an input, classify the intent of the input text.
Select the correct intent of the given input text from a list of options.

Intent Descriptions.description: an intent related to voicing a comment or phrase appealing to humor.
an intent related to the extra baggage allowed on a flight.
an intent related to the expiration date of foods.
an intent related to particular components that concern insurance.
an intent related to activites one performs outside of work.
an intent related to the expiration date.
an intent related to blocking of an account.
an intent related to questions regarding food choices.
an intent related to the factors associated with a flight.

Positive Examples.input: should i get a travel visa for spain
add all of my points for my current discover card
i need a 401k rolled over to my brand new job
what is the expiration date on my credit card
do i need to fill up my tires
remove carrots from my shopping list and add soda
please set the timer for me
schedule me an uber to the mall
i would like to make a pto request for july 17th and 18th
has my vacation request been approved
